Name: Star Rogue
About the game: Star Rogue is a sci-fi roguelike platformer. In this challenging pixel indie game you will take control over a brave space marine to investigate an abandoned space station full of traps, robots and aliens. In each playthrough you will encounter a different environment full of randomly arranged rooms. With the choice between several weapons, abilites and different items, your playing experience will be unique each time you play. !!! ATTENTION !!! This game is still in development! Here is a rough list of planned improvements: Improved and more diverse enemy AI/movement Better graphics and animations More abilities, stages, rooms, enemies, bosses, items and unlocks If you have any questions or want to contact me, feel free to write to: starrogue [at] julianwehrmann [dot] com
